        public static long adjustTime(long target,
                              java.lang.String time)
                       throws java.text.ParseException
        Parameters:
        target - the target is time want to adjustTime
        time - the time is time string for adjust target ex: 15:20:32
        Returns:
        long that date same with target and time same with time
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
